description: Update a project phase cost item
permissions: Allowed for admins, or for users who can update the related project phase revenue item, or who are a manager on the related job production plan's customer, a manager laborer, a laborer who can manage projects, or the job production plan planner/project manager.
side_effects: Updates specified attributes and relationships for a project phase cost item.
validation_notes: At least one updatable flag must be provided. is-revenue-quantity-driver accepts true or false. project-cost-classification is unique per project-phase-revenue-item. project-resource-classification must share the same broker as the project. cost-code must belong to the project cost codes or be related to a project customer. price-estimate must belong to the project phase cost item. quantity-estimate must belong to the project phase cost item.

flags.name: --project-cost-classification
flags.description: Project cost classification ID (empty to clear)

flags.name: --project-resource-classification
flags.description: Project resource classification ID (empty to clear)

flags.name: --unit-of-measure
flags.description: Unit of measure ID (empty to clear)
